1370: Cats was born in Koe straet in 1370.
Got married to Imsoete at age 23 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Imsoete, Truden, at age 24.
1372: Had a daughter with Imsoete, Ghodelde, at age 25.
1373: Had a son with Imsoete, Riuum, at age 26.
1374: Had a son with Imsoete, Folkero, at age 27.
1375: Had a son with Imsoete, Hylonus, at age 28.
1376: Lost his wife Imsoete while she was giving birth to Samuel in 1376.
1379: Lost son Riuum when Riuum was 7 years old.
1387: Lost son Samuel when Samuel was 12 years old.
1391: Lost son Hylonus when Hylonus was 17 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
